project: RIMAN Hauptkategorien Bilder - Optimierte Midjourney Prompts

brand_guidelines.style: Clean, modern, industrial precision, German B2B corporate photography

rueckbaumanagement.primary_prompt: Professional demolition project manager in hard hat and safety vest reviewing building deconstruction plans on tablet, controlled demolition of German industrial building in background, heavy excavator and separation containers visible, systematic material sorting for recycling, bright professional lighting, corporate documentation photography style, German construction safety standards visible, Canon EOS R5, 24-70mm lens, sharp focus on planning precision --ar 16:9 --v 6
style_variations: Corporate Focus: German project manager coordinating demolition team meeting, hard hats and hi-vis jackets, professional building site office, industrial blueprints spread on table, confident leadership atmosphere, Canon 5D Mark IV, 35mm lens --ar 16:9 --v 6

Technical Focus: Controlled building deconstruction with advanced sorting equipment, material separation systems, dust suppression technology, recycling containers labeled in German, precision machinery operations, Sony A7R IV, 70-200mm lens --ar 16:9 --v 6

Results Focus: Before/after split composition showing completed demolition project, left side showing systematic deconstruction process, right side showing clean prepared construction site, environmental protection measures visible, drone photography perspective --ar 16:9 --v 6

seo_metadata.alt_text: Professionelles Rückbau-Management mit Bauleitung und Projektkoordination auf deutscher Baustelle
seo_metadata.caption: RIMAN GmbH - Kostengünstige Abbruchplanung mit fachgerechter Entsorgung und Sicherheitskoordination

rueckbaumanagement.verbesserung_zu_aktuell: Spezifisch auf RIMAN Rückbau-Expertise zugeschnitten vs. generisches Bild - zeigt deutsche Baustelle, professionelle Planung, Kostenoptimierung und Sicherheitsstandards

altlastensanierung.primary_prompt: Environmental remediation specialist in full protective gear collecting soil samples with professional drilling equipment, contaminated site remediation in German industrial area, groundwater monitoring wells and containment barriers visible, laboratory analysis equipment in background, safety protocols clearly followed, professional environmental documentation photography, bright technical lighting, Sony A7R IV, 85mm lens, shallow depth of field emphasizing precision sampling --ar 16:9 --v 6
style_variations: Corporate Focus: Environmental consultant team discussing remediation strategy with technical drawings, wearing safety equipment and hi-vis jackets, German environmental regulations visible on documents, professional consultation atmosphere, Canon 5D Mark IV, 50mm lens --ar 16:9 --v 6

Technical Focus: Advanced soil remediation technology in operation, vacuum extraction systems, chemical treatment units, groundwater monitoring network, German environmental standards compliance visible, industrial-scale cleanup operations, 70-200mm telephoto lens --ar 16:9 --v 6

Before/After Focus: Split composition showing contaminated site transformation, left showing polluted soil and groundwater contamination, right showing successful remediation with clean soil and restored ecosystem, environmental success story --ar 16:9 --v 6

seo_metadata.alt_text: Professionelle Altlastensanierung mit Bodenuntersuchung und Grundwassermonitoring durch RIMAN Umweltexperten

altlastensanierung.verbesserung_zu_aktuell: Zeigt echte Umweltsanierung mit deutschen Standards vs. generisches Umweltbild - betont RIMAN Expertise in Altlastenerkundung und fachgerechter Sanierung

schadstoff_management.primary_prompt: Hazardous material removal specialists in full white protective suits and P3 respirators systematically removing asbestos insulation from German industrial building ceiling, negative pressure containment system visible, professional decontamination chamber setup, safety warning signs in German, bright professional LED lighting, corporate safety documentation photography style, Canon EOS R5, 24-70mm lens, sharp focus on protective equipment and safety protocols --ar 16:9 --v 6
style_variations: Corporate Focus: RIMAN safety coordinator conducting hazmat briefing with removal team, protective equipment laid out systematically, German TRGS safety regulations visible on documents, professional safety culture emphasis, Canon 5D Mark IV, 35mm lens --ar 16:9 --v 6

Technical Focus: Advanced air monitoring equipment during asbestos removal, HEPA filtration systems, fiber counting microscope analysis, German laboratory standards, precision measurement technology, Sony A7R IV, 100mm macro lens --ar 16:9 --v 6

Detail Focus: Close-up of proper PPE equipment - respirator mask, protective suit, safety gloves, all meeting German safety standards, professional equipment photography showing RIMAN attention to safety detail, 85mm lens with shallow depth of field --ar 16:9 --v 6

seo_metadata.alt_text: Professionelles Schadstoff-Management mit Asbest-Sanierung und vollständiger Schutzausrüstung nach deutschen Sicherheitsstandards
